name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Business identifiers assigned to this flag by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Business identifiers assigned to this flag by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Business identifiers assigned to this flag by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

name: $category
desc: Returns: Allows a flag to be divided into different categories like clinical, administrative etc. Intended to be used as a means of filtering which flags are displayed to particular user or in a given context.

name: $addcategory
desc: Allows a flag to be divided into different categories like clinical, administrative etc. Intended to be used as a means of filtering which flags are displayed to particular user or in a given context.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Allows a flag to be divided into different categories like clinical, administrative etc. Intended to be used as a means of filtering which flags are displayed to particular user or in a given context.

name: $code
desc: Returns: The coded value or textual component of the flag to display to the user.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The coded value or textual component of the flag to display to the user.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: The patient, location, group, organization, or practitioner etc. this is about record this flag is associated with.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The patient, location, group, organization, or practitioner etc. this is about record this flag is associated with.

name: $period
desc: Returns: The period of time from the activation of the flag to inactivation of the flag. If the flag is active, the end of the period should be unspecified.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The period of time from the activation of the flag to inactivation of the flag. If the flag is active, the end of the period should be unspecified.

name: $encounter
desc: Returns: This alert is only relevant during the encounter.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: This alert is only relevant during the encounter.

name: $author
desc: Returns: The person, organization or device that created the flag.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The person, organization or device that created the flag.
